attraction_summary: Cat Ba Kayak Adventures là công ty du lịch mạo hiểm chèo thuyền kayak trên biển đầy đủ dịch vụ có trụ sở tại Đảo Cát Bà Việt Nam. Lớn lên trên biển sống để phiêu lưu, sẵn sàng khám phá. Các chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền kayak có hướng dẫn của chúng tôi cung cấp một cách khác dễ học, ít tác động nhưng vẫn tích cực để khám phá vùng nước tĩnh lặng của Vịnh Hạ Long. Thuyền kayak trên biển là phương tiện ổn định, hiệu quả và cực kỳ phù hợp với biển, tạo nên một cách thú vị để trải nghiệm những kỳ quan của Đảo Cát Bà, vịnh Bái Tử Long và di sản thế giới được UNESCO công nhận này. Chúng tôi tôn trọng môi trường và vị trí của chúng tôi trong xã hội. Chuyến tham quan của chúng tôi sử dụng các sản phẩm địa phương để giảm lượng khí thải carbon và phù hợp với cộng đồng địa phương nơi chúng tôi sinh ra.Đọc thêm
reviews: DU LỊCH YÊU THÍCH TRONG TOÀN BỘ CHUYẾN ĐI CỦA CHÚNG TÔI! CƯỜNG MIỆN THẬT TUYỆT VỜI! Chúng tôi đã thực hiện chuyến tham quan chèo thuyền kayak, leo núi, nổi 3 ngày 2 đêm. Ngay từ đầu, Cường Mr. Henry đã rất chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và phản hồi nhanh trên WhatsApp. Anh ấy vui lòng và nhanh chóng trả lời tất cả các câu hỏi của chúng tôi, chúng tôi có khá nhiều câu hỏi trong số đó nên chúng tôi quyết định đặt tour cùng anh ấy. Toàn bộ chuyến tham quan diễn ra suôn sẻ và thực sự TUYỆT VỜI! Hướng dẫn viên của chúng tôi, Miện, ​​là người hiểu biết, thân thiện, vui tính, chân thật, rất hiếu khách và chuyên nghiệp. Thuyền trưởng taxi nước thỉnh thoảng chở chúng tôi cũng rất thân thiện và chuyên nghiệp. Chúng tôi thích tìm hiểu về vịnh và cuộc sống ở Cát Bà từ Miện cũng như kết nối những sở thích chung của chúng tôi bằng sự hài hước. Miện đã chăm sóc chúng tôi rất tốt và đã đi Above and Beyond để đảm bảo rằng chúng tôi được an toàn và có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời. Vịnh rất đẹp và ít đông đúc hơn Vịnh Hạ Long. Miện dẫn chúng tôi qua những hang động dưới núi, những hốc tường ngoạn mục, những bãi biển nhỏ nơi chúng tôi là những người duy nhất bơi lội và thư giãn ở đó, ngắm sinh vật phù du phát quang. reviews: The entire experience for our two daysone night kayak tour has been unforgettable. Mr. Henry, the owner, was very quick to respond by email and WhatsApp during the booking process. On the morning of our tour, we were first picked up by a bus; it also picked up several other passengers from other hotels in the Old French Quarter. We were then off for a two-hour bus ride with a 10 minutes break in between. Then, we all transferred to a 5 minutes speed boat ride across to Cat Ba Island. At that pier, we got into another 30 minutes bus ride to the pier where Cat Ba Kayak is located and where we got to meet Mr. Henry,  who gave us an overview of our trip in Lan Ha Bay. My partner and I were joined by another couple, and the four of us were guided by Minh. He led us to a small, yet functional boat that took us out into the Bay. We first had some lunch on that boat cooked by the Captain and then headed out to kayak for several hours. Afterwards, the boat then took us to our overnight boat hotel where dinner was served and where we stayed. The rooms were clean and functional, and we had a great nights sleep. The following morning, we were served breakfast and then went for some more swimming and kayaking in other parts of the Bay. By kayaking into less-frequented areas, we were, at times, all alone to enjoy the peaceful serenity of nature with the birds, fish, jelly fish, cicadas, and occasional monkeys. Despite the unfortunate pieces of floating trash in the Bay, the entire experience far outweighs the negative. Perhaps, in the future, eitherboth the government or even tour groups can help to clean up the Bay and do our parts to help the environment. Overall, we highly recommend this kayaking tour if you are looking for a more intimate experience away from the crowds and exploring quieter, more serene parts of the Bay. Even as novice kayakers, we were able to enjoy the experience immensely, and it was not difficult for us.Read more

Absolutely blown away by the surrealistic natural wonders of islands and lagoons around Cat Ba Bay, my friends and I enjoyed chillaxing daily kayaks and light trekking to explore the area with the company of our local tour guide, Mong. Mong spoke good English and was really, really helpful throughout the trip. He was knowledgable of the flora and fauna, where we would have missed seeing the coastal animal lives passing us by. A real surprise was the many jellyfish and crabs that we found in the water and inland respectively.Super recommend kayaking as this is the best mode of transport to fully immerse in the scenery and be in touch with the beautiful nature. The waters were calm mostly and the weather is fantastic in early August when we booked the trip. We also saw the local livelihoods of the floating villages who farmed a variety of seafoods - squids, oysters, fishes etc. Mong even brought us to a quiet beach where white clams were found in abundance, where we picked some to enjoy as an extra dish for dinner on the junk. Our first night at the junk was catered just for the 3 of us with 2 comfortable cabins and open area at the top for chillaxing. Love the privacy and our captain, Big, together with his chef, whipped up delicious local delicacies and brought us to hidden away pockets of lagoons so we could rest and enjoy the scenery. The next night was spent in chalets by the seas and having different accommodations on each night is a good mix. On our last day, the owner of CatBa Adventure, Henry specially arranged for Mong to bring us around the local markets, the nearby beach and a breeze around the mainland CatBa before our departure to mainland Hanoi. Try the local produced juice drinks or egg coffee by the local cafe, we love it! Truly appreciate the extra mile and making this trip truly special for all of us.Read more

We learned about Cat Ba Kayak Adventures from our neighbors, who visited Vietnam in 2015 and took a kayaking trip with Mr. Henry through the dramatic karst formations of Lan Ha Bay.  Mr. Henry is the co-owner of Cat Bay Kayak Adventures. His Vietnamese name is Xuan Cuong. I contacted him by email and the next day he forwarded several itineraries and prices.  I also got a quote from one of the numerous companies that operate large luxury junks, with fancy staterooms, elegant meals and cocktails.  The price quotes from Cat Ba Kayak Adventures and the luxury junk company where just a few dollars apart.  But Cat Ba Kayak Adventures seems to be the only operator dedicated to extensive kayaking and getting away from the crowds.Our primary interest was to get out on the water and paddle through the remarkable rock formations, to experience the natural wonder of these bays.  So we elected to sign up with Cat Ba Kayak Adventures for a 3-day, two night trip, leaving from Cat Ba Island on July 4 and returning the afternoon of July 6, 2022. The trip proved to be a remarkable experience,  and absolutely the right choice.We were on a small junk, just my wife and me, our guide and the boats captain, with two kayaks tied to the stern.
